About Me

My name is Peter Brown and I'm a Ruby and Rails developer from Burlington, Vermont with a strong passion for software craftsmanship. I build web applications at Agilion, and enjoy helping people solve problems, tweeting about cats, writing and sharing code, and wearing suits.

I co-founded both the Burlington Web Application Group and the Burlington Ruby Group, and organize the annual Burlington Ruby Conference.
